title: musician.start
body:
<<if $spoken_to_musician == 0>>
    LAMMY: hey GIRL, i haven't seen you before, i'm LAMMY
    LAMMY: i just got kicked out of my band so if you got one, i'm looking to join
    <<set $spoken_to_musician to 1>>
<<endif>>
<<if $musician_talked_to_today is 1>>
    LAMMY: ♪ you're totally bothering me ♪
    LAMMY: ♪ come back tomorrow when i'm not busy ♪
    <<stop>>
<<else>>
    <<if $musician_day is 0>>
        LAMMY: hey GIRL, i'm super bummed out since my band dropped me
        LAMMY: i need a lyric that's DARK and BROODING that rhymes with "SAD"
        [[♪ cats are totally rad ♪|musician.wronglyric1]][[♪ i really hate you, dad ♪|musician.wronglyric2]][[♪ don't kick me out of the band, BRAD ♪|musician.rightlyric]]
    <<elseif $musician_day is 1>>
        LAMMY: day two
        [[end day|musician.daytwo]]
    <<elseif $musician_day is 2>>
        LAMMY: day three
        [[end day|musician.daythree]]
    <<endif>>
<<endif>>

title: musician.wronglyric1
body:
LAMMY: ♪ why'd you have to make me so SAD ♪
LAMMY: ♪ cats are totally rad ♪
LAMMY: ...
LAMMY: lame.
LAMMY: cya tomorrow, GIRL
<<set $musician_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: musician.rightlyric
body:
LAMMY: that lyric really speaks to my soul
LAMMY: ♪ why'd you have to make me so SAD ♪
LAMMY: ♪ don't kick me out of the band, BRAD ♪
LAMMY: wow this is great CONTENT
LAMMY: i can't wait to put this up on my 'tube
LAMMY: ...
LAMMY: nice jamming, GIRL
<<addlove CurrentTarget>>
<<set $musician_day to 1>>
<<set $musician_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: musician.wronglyric2
body:
LAMMY: ♪ why'd you have to make me so SAD ♪
LAMMY: ♪ i really hate you, dad ♪
LAMMY: ...
LAMMY: lame.
LAMMY: cya tomorrow, GIRL
<<set $musician_talked_to_today to 1>>
